ModMetaData.name: Just Another Ammo Pack
ModMetaData.author: Mobivis
ModMetaData.description:
- Code base on Advanced Ammo Mod by LimeTreeSnake - Just another ammo pack mod coded by Mobivis
Can be used together with Simple Ammo and Advanced Ammo. This is made for missing ammo type for guns mods that I used.
- .277 Fury and .338 Norma Magnum Ammo for [HRK] Gun Nut - M5 SPEAR, M250 and MG 338
- 20x42mm HEI and SAPHEI [HRK] Gun Nut - Chapter #2 - Neopup
- 5.45×39mm [HRK] Gun Nut - Chapter #1 - Zenitco AK 105
- FN 5.7x28mm Ammo for [HRK] Gun Nut - Chapter #2 - PD90 SD from [HRK] Gun Nut - Kel-tec - Kel-Tec P50 from
- .308 Winchester [HRK] Gun Nut - Chapter #1 - AB Arms Mod X - Archangel M1A
- 10mm Caseless [HRK] Gun Nut - Chapter #1 - M41A Pulse Rifle - M56 Smart gun
- 40x46mm Grenades V.W.E Grenades Laucher [HRK] Gun Nut - Chapter #2 - M320 GL
